channel.title: Need help with starter Transfers. Players cannot drop but can trade
channel.description: How do I make it so they cannot trade until the 30 minute time is up?

item.title: Need help with starter Transfers. Players cannot drop but can trade
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

If I understand what was said in the title correctly,players cannot drop for 30 minutes when the first make an account but they can trade when they first make an account.
Take the code for your drop timer thing and apply it towards the trade method. Or use the search button to see if you can find a tutorial.

Read full topic
